Description: Handle of Koan(?) pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp
Curator's comments: Known from Petrie's drawing in his Journal, 1884-5, p.55, 23. It is probable that it is to be equated with one of the similar stamps in the British Museum. Name, Sopatros.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0092)
